statements.select: SELECT B.VisitorHistorySeq, A.VisitorID, A.VisitorName, A.Company AS VisitorCompany, A.Mobile AS VisitorMobile, B.HostID, (SELECT HOSTNAME FROM HOST WHERE HOSTID = B.HOSTID) AS HostName, (SELECT Company FROM HOST WHERE HOSTID = B.HOSTID) AS HostCompany, B.SignPath, B.VisitDate AS VisitDateTime, B.AgreeFirst As AgreeFirstFlag, B.AgreeSecond As AgreeSecondFlag, B.CARDID, (SELECT CARDFLAG FROM CARD WHERE CARDID = B.CARDID) AS CARDFLAG, (SELECT ISNULL([DESC],'N') FROM VisitorBlackList WHERE VisitorID = A.VisitorID) AS BlackList, B.VisitorDesc FROM VISITOR A, VISITORHISTORY B WHERE A.VISITORID = B.VISITORID ORDER BY VisitDateTime DESC

SELECT B.VisitorHistorySeq, A.VisitorID, A.VisitorName, A.Company AS VisitorCompany, A.Mobile AS VisitorMobile, B.HostID, (SELECT HOSTNAME FROM HOST WHERE HOSTID = B.HOSTID) AS HostName, (SELECT Company FROM HOST WHERE HOSTID = B.HOSTID) AS HostCompany, B.SignPath, B.VisitDate AS VisitDateTime, B.AgreeFirst As AgreeFirstFlag, B.AgreeSecond As AgreeSecondFlag, B.CARDID, (SELECT CARDFLAG FROM CARD WHERE CARDID = B.CARDID) AS CARDFLAG, (SELECT ISNULL([DESC],'N') FROM VisitorBlackList WHERE VisitorID = A.VisitorID) AS BlackList FROM VISITOR A, VISITORHISTORY B WHERE A.VISITORID = B.VISITORID AND B.VisitorHistorySeq = #VisitorHistorySeq#

SELECT B.VisitorHistorySeq, A.VisitorID, A.VisitorName, A.Company AS VisitorCompany, A.Mobile AS VisitorMobile, B.HostID, (SELECT HostName FROM HOST WHERE HOSTID = B.HOSTID) AS HostName, (SELECT Company FROM HOST WHERE HOSTID = B.HOSTID) AS HostCompany, B.SignPath, B.VisitDate AS VisitDateTime, B.AgreeFirst As AgreeFirstFlag, B.AgreeSecond As AgreeSecondFlag, B.CARDID, (SELECT CARDFLAG FROM CARD WHERE CARDID = B.CARDID) AS CARDFLAG, (SELECT ADMINID FROM VisitorBlackList WHERE VisitorID = A.VisitorID) AS BlackList FROM VISITOR A, VISITORHISTORY B WHERE A.VISITORID = B.VISITORID AND B.VisitDate Between CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 112) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEADD(Day,1,GETDATE()), 112)

statements.select: SELECT HostID , HostName , Mobile , Company , Tel , GradeName FROM Host WHERE DELETEFLAG = 'N'

SELECT TOP 5 RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(A.HOSTID) DESC) AS RANK , A.HostID , B.HostName , B.Company , ISNULL(B.GradeName,'') AS GradeName , ISNULL(B.Mobile,'') AS Mobile , ISNULL(B.Tel,'') AS Tel FROM VisitorHistory A, HOST B WHERE A.HOSTID= B.HOSTID AND A.VisitDate Between CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEADD(Month,-1,GETDATE()), 112) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 112) AND B.DELETEFLAG = 'N' GROUP BY A.HOSTID , B.HostName , B.Company , B.GradeName , B.Mobile , B.Tel
